name: Flask Miracle
description:
A story about legend alchemy......

A life who wake up on the flask, 

you can choose to fight against the fate,

or accept anything just blink the whole day.

Control:

Only your mouse

Click Left key to move.

Game Jam:

I do my best to finish this game, and it submitted to the https://itch.io/jam/gmtk-2020

And the theme for GMTK Game Jam 2020 was "Out of Control".

Music:

The bgm in my game was download from https://maoudamashii.jokersounds.com/

SFX:

The SFX and sound in my game was download from https://taira-komori.jpn.org/freesoundtw.html

Thank you.
